history.proof: intros w k x H. unfold lift. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_gt_dec,Gt.

exceptions.tactic: assert (le_gt_dec k x = Gt) as Hgt by (apply Nat.compare_gt_iff; auto).
exceptions.exn: In environment w, k, x : nat H : k > x The term "Gt" has type "comparison" while it is expected to have type "{k <= x} + {k > x}".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall w k x : nat, k > x -> lift w k x = x

Premises:
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Lift_idx = {| lift := fun w k x : nat => if le_gt_dec k x then w + x else x |} : Lift nat
Build_LiftVar : forall (A : Type) (H : Var A) (H0 : Lift A), (forall w k x : nat, lift w k (var x) = var (lift w k x)) -> LiftVar
lift_var : forall w k x : nat, lift w k (var x) = var (lift w k x) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?A] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?A] ?LiftVar : [ |- LiftVar]
Record LiftVar (A : Type) (H : Var A) (H0 : Lift A) : Prop := Build_LiftVar { lift_var : forall w k x : nat, lift w k (var x) = var (lift w k x) } Arguments LiftVar {A}%type_scope {H H0} Arguments Build_LiftVar [A]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftInjective : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2) -> LiftInjective
Nat.lt_irrefl : forall x : nat, ~ x < x
lift_injective : forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : ?T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2 where ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?T] ?LiftInjective : [ |- LiftInjective]
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
List.count_occ_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), List.In x l < -> List.count_occ eq_dec l x > 0
Build_LiftSubst1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)) -> LiftSubst1
Record LiftInjective (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftInjective { lift_injective : forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments LiftInjective {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftInjective [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Nat.compare_gt_iff : forall x y : nat, (x ?= y) = Gt < -> y < x
Build_LiftSubst2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> LiftSubst2
Nat.max_min_antimonotone : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.min x y)
BinInt.Z.gt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.gt (_ _)%Z_scope
BinPos.Pos.gt = fun x y : BinNums.positive => BinPos.Pos.compare x y = Gt : BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> Prop Arguments BinPos.Pos.gt (_ _)%positive_scope
BinInt.Z.lt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : BinNums.positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Init.Nat.add x 1 : BinNums.positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
BinInt.Z.ge = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.ge (_ _)%Z_scope
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
lift_subst_1 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst1 : [ |- LiftSubst1]
Nat.max_min_antimono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.min x y)
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
Record LiftSubst1 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst1 { lift_subst_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) } Arguments LiftSubst1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst2 : [ |- LiftSubst2]
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_PunPun : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> PunPun
lift_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst : [ |- LiftSubst]
List.count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
lift_lift_reversed : LiftLift -> forall wk k ws s t : nat, k >= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws s (lift wk (k - ws) t)
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)) -> LiftLift
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match x with | BinNums.Z0 => y | BinNums.Zpos x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | BinNums.Zneg x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') end end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
ZifyClasses.mkinj : forall (S T : Type) (inj : S -> T) (pred : T -> Prop), (forall x : S, pred (inj x)) -> ZifyClasses.InjTyp S T
pun_pun : forall (v : ?V) (w k : nat) (t : ?T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?PunPun : [ |- PunPun]
lift_lift : forall (t : ?T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?T] ?LiftLift : [ |- LiftLift]
Build_LiftLiftFuse : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), s <= k <= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift (wk + ws) s t) -> LiftLiftFuse
Record PunPun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_PunPun { pun_pun : forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments PunPun {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_PunPun [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope

```coq
intros w k x H.
unfold lift.
assert (le_gt_dec k x = Gt) as Hgt by (apply Nat.compare_gt_iff; auto).
rewrite Hgt.
reflexivity.
Qed. 
Qed.
```

original: intros w k x H. unfold lift. assert (le_gt_dec k x = Gt) as Hgt by (apply Nat.compare_gt_iff; auto). rewrite Hgt. reflexivity.
